name: SearlMedia-ClevelandMarketingPodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Keep up with the latest marketing and technology news while ensuring your business is ahead of everyone else. From advice and opinions on what you can do now, to thoughts on what will happen in five years. Brian Searl, CEO of Searl Media and Insider Perks helps you understand how to take practical steps without breaking the bank.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
